description:
It is very important that you use free and legal music for your video projects. Picovico offers you with a large library of commercially licensed music to make it easy for you to create videos.


In addition, for your ease, there are couple of great sites that provide you with royalty free music for your online videos. Some of the websites providing Royalty Free music downloads are - 

  • Incompetech
  • DanoSongs
  • Moby Gratis
  • Free Soundtrack Music
  • ccMixter
  • Partners in Rhyme
  • PacDV
  • Public Domain 4U
  • Musopen
  • Beatpick
  • YouTube Audio Library
  • Playlists by a YouTube Channel (Audio Library - No Copyright Music)

title: Where can I find royalty free music for my video projects ?
